flow.display_value: Process Request for a New External Service

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛Requested Item Record➛Requested for➛First name,

The following instructions will help you to make final edits and promote your new "1➛case_name" to production.

  1. Review your item in development as a citizen would see it:  Flow Variables➛development_urlpub?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=Flow Variables➛remote_item_id&sysparm_category=Flow Variables➛item_category_for_url

  2. If you need to edit your case you can go here to make any changes: Flow Variables➛development_urlnow/build/catalog/home
    Note: Ensure all of your changes are Published by finalizing all edits.

  3. Promote to Acceptance Testing: Approving task: 29➛Catalog Task➛Number here: https://jspirkodemo.service-now.com/esc?id=hrm_todos_page will finalize your development and move to test.    

  4. Submit a request for development assistance: COMMING SOON!

  5. Click here to see the contractual arrangement draft: COMMING SOON!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛Requested Item Record➛Requested for➛First name,

The following instructions will help you to make final edits and promote your new "1➛case_name" to production.

  1. Review your item in development as a citizen would see it:  Flow Variables➛development_urlpub?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=Flow Variables➛remote_item_id&sysparm_category=Flow Variables➛item_category_for_url

  2. If you need to edit your case you can go here to make any changes: Flow Variables➛development_urlnow/build/catalog/home
    Note: Ensure all of your changes are Published by finalizing all edits.

  3. Promote to Acceptance Testing: Approving task: 29➛Catalog Task➛Number here: https://jspirkodemo.service-now.com/esc?id=hrm_todos_page will finalize your development and move to test.    

  4. Submit a request for development assistance: COMMING SOON!

  5. Click here to see the contractual arrangement draft: COMMING SOON!
